text: Sesame Street is bringing back the “ Rubber Duckie ” song with a parody of one of the most popular songs of 2017 – “ Despacito. ” “ El Patito, ” which is Spanish for “ rubber ducky ”, pays homage to Ernie ’ s most beloved toy duck. In this “ Despacito ” parody, Ernie, Bert and Rosita sing along for the chorus in Spanish : “ Oh, el patito, es mi favorito / Donde quiera que vaya hace su sonido / El patito es tu buen amigo / El patito. ” The YouTube video was released on Monday and already has been viewed over 360, 000 times.
